Modelo Gerado a partir do algortimo J48 - sem alterações de parâmetros somente exlcluindo o atributo ID

Relation:     iris-train-weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.Remove-R1
Instances:    100
Attributes:   5
              SepalLengthCm
              SepalWidthCm
              PetalLengthCm
              PetalWidthCm
              Species
Test mode:    evaluate on training data

**J48 pruned tree
------------------**

PetalWidthCm <= 0.6: Iris-setosa (35.0)
PetalWidthCm > 0.6
|   PetalLengthCm <= 4.7: Iris-versicolor (31.0)
|   PetalLengthCm > 4.7: Iris-virginica (34.0/2.0)
